There is no "voting" or "voting power" in Bitcoin. 

There is a decentralized p2p network of nodes which form a consensus on block and transaction validation rules, and there is proof-of-work timestamping for transaction ordering.

Read more here: https://medium.com/@pierre_rochard/bitcoin-governance-37e86299470fâ€¦
